text: In September 2004, Acclaim Entertainment filed for bankruptcy, registering over $100 million in debt. This meant that the franchises Acclaim had rights to were up for grabs. The Extreme-G franchise was purchased by Throwback Entertainment in July 2006].Throwback has issued word that it will bring its newly acquired franchises to new levels on the next-generation platforms, indicating a strong possibility that the Extreme-G franchise may see the light of day on a next gen console - WIKIPEDIA
